Resistance.help: Ember Demons are resistant to Fear effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Fire Blast and Shield of Hellfire.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Fear, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

Fire_Blast.help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Shield_of_Hellfire.help: The Ember Demon bathes your allies in an Ember Shield increasing their damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Toxic, Cold and Fire damage.
Shield_of_Hellfire.shortHelp: Auto PBAoE, Ally +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Toxic)
Shield_of_Hellfire.targetHelp: The Ember Shield has increased your resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Shield_of_Hellfire.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} protects {PlayerDest} with its {PowerName} increasing their resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Shield_of_Hellfire.victimHit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Toxic and Cold damage.

Ember_Shield_Owner.help: The Ember Demon's Ember Shield grants an additional damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Toxic, Cold and Fire damage bonus to its owner.
Ember_Shield_Owner.shortHelp: Auto PBAoE, Owner +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Toxic)
Ember_Shield_Owner.targetHelp: The Ember Shield has increased your resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Ember_Shield_Owner.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} protects {PlayerDest} with its {PowerName} increasing their resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Ember_Shield_Owner.victimHit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Toxic and Cold damage.

Fire_Breath.help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Abyssal_Mending.help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. This power can only be used on other summoned demons. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health with their {PowerName}
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Enchant_Demon.help: Your Ember Demon has been Enchanted. It can now heal demon allies using Abyssal Mending as well as use its Fire Breath power.

Fire_Ball.help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Ball.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Abyssal_Reconstruction.help: An Ember Demon can channel hellfire through all nearby allies. This power has a long recharge and can only be used on allies.

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health with their {PowerName}
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Abyssal_Empowerment.help: Your Ember Demon has been Empowered. It can now use Fire Ball and Abyssal Reconstruction.
